text.div:
NoDomainVitalSigns

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.no/fhir/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.no.domain.vitalsigns

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Blood pressure
resource.description: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Blood pressure information. The local measurement of arterial blood pressure, which is a surrogate for arterial pressure in the systemic circulation.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Height
resource.description:
Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Height information.  
To be used for recording the measured height or body length of an individual at any point in time.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Mass Index (BMI)
resource.description: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Mass Index information. Calculated measurement which compares a person's weight and height.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Temperature
resource.description: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Temperature information. Used for recording the measurement of an individual's body temperature, which is a surrogate for the core body temperature of the individual.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Weight
resource.description: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Weight information. To be used for recording the actual measurement of body weight, including when the individual is missing a body part due to a congenital cause or after surgical removal.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Heart Rate
resource.description:
Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Heart Rate information.  
Use to record the presence or absence of a pulse or heart beat.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Oxygen Saturation
resource.description:
Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Oxygen Saturation information.  
Use to record blood oxygen and related measurements, measured by pulse oximetry or pulse CO-oximetry.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Pulse
resource.description: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Pulse information. The rate and associated attributes for a pulse.

resource.name: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Respiration Rate
resource.description:
Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Respiration Rate information.  
Use to record the observed and measured characteristics of spontaneous breathing by an individual, including respiratory rate, depth and rhythm.

resource.name: Vkp VitalSigns Observation - Blood pressure
resource.description: Profile for blood pressure in VKP.

resource.description: Formula used to calculate the pressure.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationActiveHeatingExtension
resource.description: description of the conditions applied

resource.description: The position of the individual at the time of measurement.

resource.description: The degree of exposure of the individual at the time of measurement.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationBodyHeightBodyPositionExtension

resource.description: Formula used to derive the body mass index.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationCharacterOfHeartRateExtension
resource.description: Description of the character of the pulse or heart beat.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationClinicalDescriptionExtension
resource.description: Narrative description about the pulse or heart beat.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationClothingStateExtension
resource.description: Description of the state of dress of the person at the time of weighing.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationConfoundingFactorExtension
resource.description: Description of the confounding factor.

resource.description: The size of the cuff used for blood pressure measurement.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationDaysSinceMenstruationStartExtension
resource.description: Current day of the menstrual cycle.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationDiastolicEndPointExtension
resource.description: Record which Korotkoff sound is used for determining diastolic pressure using auscultative method.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationEnvironmentalConditionsExtension
resource.description: Description of the environmental conditions.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationHeadTiltExtension
resource.description: The craniocaudal tilt of the surface on which the person is lying at the time of measurement.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationHeartRateBodyPositionExtension
resource.description: The body position of the subject during the observation.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationHeartRhythmExtension
resource.description: Regularity of the pulse or heart beat.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationHeartRhythmIrregularityExtension
resource.description: More specific pattern of an irregular pulse or heart beat.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationHeatingDeviceExtension
resource.description: Details about the environmental conditions at the time of temperature measurement.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationInspiredOxygenExtension
resource.description: Details of the amount of oxygen available to the subject at the time of observation.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationLevelOfExertionExtension
resource.description: Details about the exertion of the person at the time of measurement.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationOxygenSaturationExtension
resource.description: Description of the oxygen saturation levels

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationPrePostduktalExtension
resource.description: Description of the pre/post/intermediate level of ductal

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationRespirationDepthExtension

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationRespirationRegularityExtension
resource.description: The regularity of spontaneous breathing.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationSleepStatusExtension
resource.description: Sleep status - supports interpretation of 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure records.

resource.name: NoDomainVitalSignsObservationSpontaneousBreathingExtension
resource.description: A narrative description about the spontaneous breathing of the individual.
